ygData.subject: Singing Steel effects
ygData.msgSnippet: Several people have asked what others thought would be a good effect for singing steel (other than the drek we already know about). Yes, gate would be nice.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Several people have asked what others thought would be a good effect for
singing steel (other than the drek we already know about).

Yes, gate would be nice. I hate that moment at the end of a raid where I'm
desparately counting..."how many melee left and how many wizards/druids???"

But here's what we could really use: A Charisma buff.

Warriors get a str buff. If we're grouped with an enchanter who can buff
us, our charisma is less relavant (though not irrelevant), but if there's no
chanter or shaman around... well, it'd be nice.

Knaeve
Quellius
